title: Sally's double chocolate chip muffins
ingredients: ['275g (10 oz) plain flour', '4 level teaspoons baking powder', '4 tablespoons cocoa powder', '75g (3 oz) caster sugar', '2 medium eggs', '225ml (8 fl oz) milk', '110g (4 oz) butter, melted', '1 teaspoon natural vanilla extract', '75g (3 oz) plain chocolate chips', '75g (3 oz) white chocolate chips']
